Soal Impor Pacul, Pengusaha: Malu-maluin dan Nggak Masuk Akal
07 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Ketua umum Kamar Dagang Industri (Kadin) Indonesia Rosan Roeslani/Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) mengeluhkan soal impor pacul. Pengusaha pun sepaham dengan keluhan Jokowi.Ketua umum Kamar Dagang Industri (Kadin) Indonesia Rosan Roeslani menyayangkan masih adanya impor pacul. Rosan menyebut hal ini sangat memalukan dan menyedihkan."Mestinya sih pacul nggak usah impor ya, terus terang saya setuju sama Bapak Presiden. Malu-maluin, apapun alasannya mestinya nggak masuk akal, pacul gitu kan, menyedihkan," ucap Rosan di sela Rakernas Ekonomi Kreatif Kadin, di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Rosan menilai pacul bukan teknologi tinggi yang seharusnya mudah saja diproduksi dalam negeri. Belum lagi pasar pacul dalam negeri juga besar."Itu kan suatu alat bukan teknologi tinggi. Sebetulnya bisa bangun, marketnya udah ada pacul ini, ini kita kan negara agraris yang serapan tenaga kerja pertaniannya besar gitu kan," ungkap Rosan.Selanjutnya, dia juga meminta pemerintah untuk menghubungkan dan mengintegrasikan produsen dengan pemakai pacul."Industri bisa dibangun dan dikerjasamakan dengan UMKM, yang penting gimana satukan produsen dan pemakainya, ini lah pemerintah harus berperan hadir juga," papar Rosan.Rosan kembali lagi menegaskan kekecewaannya soal impor pacul. Dia mengatakan impor pacul ini sangat konyol."Menurut saya ridiculous sih kalau pacul aja masih impor," tegas Rosan.Sebelumnya, Presiden Jokowi menyoroti soal pengadaan barang pacul yang masih impor. Ada ratusan ribu unit pacul yang dibutuhkan."Ini puluhan ribu, ratusan ribu pacul yang dibutuhkan masih impor. Apakah negara kita yang sebesar ini industrinya yang sudah berkembang benar pacul pacul harus impor?" ujar Jokowi di Rakornas LKPP di JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Pacul Import Problem, Entrepreneurs: Shy and Doesn't Make Sense
Nov 7 2019, 08:08 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Chairperson of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Kadin) Rosan Roeslani / Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) complained about hoe import. The businessman agreed with Jokowi's complaint. Indonesian General Chairman of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce (Kadin) Rosan Roeslani regretted that there were still hoe imports. Rosan said that this was very embarrassing and sad. "Shouldn't hoe do not have to import it, frankly I agree with Mr. President. Shame, whatever the reason it should not make sense, hoe so right, sad," said Rosan on the sidelines of the National Economic Rakernas Creative Kadin, at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). The room rate hoe is not a high technology that should be easily produced domestically. Not to mention the domestic hoe market is also large. "That is not a high-tech tool. Actually, we can build, the market already has this hoe, this is an agrarian country that absorbs large agricultural workers, right," said Rosan. Furthermore, he also "The industry can be built and cooperated with MSMEs, the important thing is how to unite producers and users, this is the government must play a role too," Rosan said. Rosan again emphasized his disappointment about the import of pacul. He said importing hoe is very ridiculous. "I think it's ridiculous if hoe is still importing," Rosan stressed. Previously, President Jokowi highlighted the matter of procuring hoe goods that were still imported. There are hundreds of thousands of hoe units needed. "These are tens of thousands, hundreds of thousands of hoes needed are still imported. Does our country as big as this industry that has developed really hoe hoe must import?" said Jokowi at the National Coordination Meeting of LKPP at JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
